name: ORBS Training Simulation
description:
Headphones are required if you expect to do well.
Left click to shoot
Tap A to block (but only if you're looking at the enemy that is shooting at you).
Escape to get your cursor back.
You may need to allow this game to hide your pointer in the browser.

As you can see on the main screen, this game was made as part of the Audiogame Jam for 2016,l a two week long jam where you make a game that can be played exclusively with audio.

Thanks for stopping by!

Version 1.1:
-made sure cursor is not hidden during main menu
-added Escape key to exit on main menu
-made end-game score count up a little more attractive
-added Mac and Linux downloads
